segments.text: Have you heard about Alice and David ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , have they had another fight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must be joking . Those two ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , my dear , I didn't believe it either . But I got it straight from the horse's mouth . David called me this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So when did this all happen ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Last weekend , while they were on their ski trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I believe it now , and when are they are getting married ?
segments.speaker: S2
